# Astro Blog Project

This is an Astro-based blog with markdown content collections.

## Project Structure
- `/src/content/blog/` - Markdown articles
- `/src/pages/` - Page routes
- `/public/` - Static assets (images)

## Status
- [x] Project scaffolded
- [x] Content collections configured
- [x] Example article created
- [x] Main page listing articles
- [x] Article detail page template
